metadata.title: CVE-2023-26937 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in XPDF v.4.04 allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service via GString::resize located in goo/GString.cc

notes.note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
